text:
Hello Thomas, thank you for the reply Â :blush: Up to now we are convinced that HubSpot loads CTA this way :see_no_evil:

You talked about setup, do you mean the configuration per CTA or are you thinking about a site level setting ? :pray:

I'm referring to configuration per CTA. Is this a theme or template? If it is a theme could you show me the code on the page if it is being hard coded if in the module then a pic of the code and json would be very helpful.
Example of what I mean by hard coded is an actual page where you are pulling in the module and assigning settings.
If it is all done in a drag and drop module then I would like to see the code and properties like this
